arts.ttl: Athletic Club handed Nico Williams boost before Mallorca clash
arts.sum: La Liga outfit Athletic Club have on Friday announced some altogether positive news on the personnel front. This comes amid confirmation of the long-awaited return of Nico Williams to fitness.…

arts.ttl: Athletic Club's Oihan Sancet sidelined with hamstring injury before Mallorca match
arts.sum:
Tests confirm that Oihan Sancet has suffered a mild-moderate injury to his left hamstring muscle.

It now remains to be seen just how long Sancet is ruled out of competitive action, but the attacker looks certain to miss this weekend’s La Liga meeting with RCD Mallorca.
Aaron Ashley has a correct score prediction for all of this weekend's round of ten fixtures in LaLiga, with games taking place across Friday, Saturday and Sunday.
